Introduction to

DAR-US-SHIFA FOUNDATION


Dar us Shifa Foundation is charitable non-profit organization to provide free dialysis and free education to needy members of our community. Our aim is to ensure that no kidney patient perishes because of lack of funds for dialysis and no children remain out of school whose parents cannot afford the cost of education. It serves the community through the following projects.

Our Projects

  1. Daru us Shifa Dialysis Centre.
  2. Shifa Habiba Halim School
  3. Shama Home School for Working Girls
  4. Education Support Programme
  5. Shifa School for Special Children.
  6. Shifa Dental and Eye Clinic
